name: exploding-chickens
description: A beautiful, online alternative to the popular Exploding Kittens card game (just with chickens).

scripts.develop: npm i && cd public/css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss-cli@latest build -o tailwind.css -c ../../config/tailwind.config.js && cd ../../ && nodemon app.js develop --ignore public/ --ignore templates/ --ignore config/stats.json
scripts.build: cd public/css && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss-cli@latest build -o tailwind.css -c ../../config/tailwind.config.js && cd ../../

author: rak3rman, sengdaojones, vmdo3, & williamyang10
